translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟に落ちたエール、一人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell fell into the cave, all alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上に向かって声をかけるが返事がない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He calls out upwards, but there is no reply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶ深く落ちたのかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He might have fallen quite deep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a situation like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動かずに救出を待つのが正しいとされるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is said to be correct to stay still and wait for rescue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっとしていてもだんだん不安になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but staying still only makes you increasingly anxious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　遭難物の雰囲気で　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In the atmosphere of a survival story)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしているうちに、ぐらぐらと揺れ始め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While doing so, the ground begins to shake unsteadily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の居た場所が崩れ始める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the place where he stood begins to collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわててそこを離れ移動する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hastily leaves and moves away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪洞窟内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the icy snow cave,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは一人で不安になりながら進む・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell advances alone, feeling uneasy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで仲間がいたのがどれだけありがたったか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He realizes how thankful he was to have companions until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間がいたから楽しかった、冒険出来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he had companions, it was fun and he could go on adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとりは・・こわい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being alone... is scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早くみんなの元に戻りたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants to return to everyone quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重に進んでいると、何か物音・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he moves cautiously, he hears some noise...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声が聞こえる。おーーい、誰かいないかーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hears voices. "Hey— is anyone there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここだー誰かいるのかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm here— is someone there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の中で反響するので誰の声か分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because voices echo inside the cave, it's unclear whose voice it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、なんとか声を頼りに進んで合流する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, relying on the voices, he manages to advance and meet up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・レリコフだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's Rerikofu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わーーーーっと、レリコフも抱きつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu also hugs him tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーん、ひとりで寂しかったー」と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, I was lonely all alone,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールとレリコフが二人で移動します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and Rerikofu move together, just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフはエール達が冬将軍と戦っているのを見て、別の冬将軍と戦っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu saw Yell and the others fighting a Winter General, and he was fighting a different Winter General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に倒した方が勝ちとするつもりだったが、さすがに二人は厳しかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They intended that whoever fell first would lose, but it was tough for just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっちは7.8人はいるのだから卑怯だとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He complained it was unfair since there were 7 or 8 opponents on the other side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、そうしているうちに氷の板を踏み外して落ちてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, while all that was happening, he slipped off an ice panel and fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: など、話ながら進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They proceed while talking about such things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どちらも一人っきりになり寂しかった後なので、饒舌になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since both had been alone and lonely, they had become talkative.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手が居るという事がうれしく、頼もしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having someone else there made them happy and felt reassuring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが足を挫く、もう動かない方がいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell twists his ankle; it's better not to move anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体力も消耗する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, his stamina is depleting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで少し休憩しようとキャンプを立てます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decide to set up a camp here and rest for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寒い・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's cold...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフがひっついてきた。この方がお互いの体温であったかいだろと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu cuddles up close, saying it's warmer sharing body heat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフもちょっと恥ずかしそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu looks a little embarrassed too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつの毛布で二人でひっつきなんとか耐える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under a single blanket, the two huddle together and somehow endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心折れそうになるエールを励ますレリコフ、あのメンバーはエールの友達なんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu encourages Yell, who is about to lose heart, saying those members are Yell's friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫絶対に助けに来てくれるよ、それにボクのヒーローも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, they'll definitely come to help, and so will my hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでそこまで信じられるかだって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You ask why I can believe that much?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして疑問に思うのか分からないよ、逆の立場だったら絶対に見つけるだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand why you'd doubt it; if the positions were reversed, you'd definitely find them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事はほんどない、残った飲み物を二人でまわしのみとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's hardly any food; they share the remaining drink by passing it between the two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お菓子を半分に分けてとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They split snacks in half...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう遭難物っぽいノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's that sort of survival-story vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：レリコフとエール）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Rerikofu and Yell)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールとレリコフ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and Rerikofu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか眠っていた、寒い・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had fallen asleep before they realized it; it's cold...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままではいけない、動かないと、僕が足を挫いたからて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This can't go on; he has to move, even though he twisted his ankle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所で待っていたらレリコフまで死んでしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they wait here like this, even Rerikofu will die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、この子、ぼくを置いて一人でいってくれといっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this kid wouldn't listen even if I told him to go on alone and leave me behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に聞いてくれない、そんな子じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He absolutely wouldn't listen; he's not that kind of person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしよう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should I do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と悩んでいると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he worries about this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ、諦めたたら駄目だよ。信じるんだ、仲間を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rerikofu says: 'You mustn't give up. Believe in your friends.'

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input
